distributionOfGeaTokens: To participate in the distribution of GEA tokens, it is necessary to send an Ether (ETH) to the address of the ICO Smart Contract. This requires an Ethereum Wallet.
createPurse: You can create a Wallet at
complicatedPassword: Think of a complicated password, and click the "Create New Wallet" button.
accessToWallet: Download and Save your Key Store file in a secure place. This file, along with the password you have already created, allows access to your Ethereum Wallet.
savePrivateKey: Print and Save your Private Key in a secure place. You can use it to restore access to your Ethereum Wallet.
loginToWallet: Go to the "Send Ether & Tokens" tab, and login to your Ethereum Wallet using the Keystore File and Password you generated in the previous steps. You can also use a Private Key to log in.
purseIsCreated: Congratulations, your Ethereum Wallet has now been created! After you have added money to your Ethereum Wallet, you can start to buy Ethereum GEA Tokens from Goldea.
smartContract: To buy GEA Tokens, you need to send the ETH (Ethereum Cryptocurrency) to the address of the GOLDEA Smart Contract.
rechargeWallet: How to add money to your Ethereum Wallet:
replenishPurse: The easiest way to add ETH Ether, if you already have some kind of cryptocurrency, is to transfer it from the exchange, or use the service provided by shapeshift.io
fiatMoney: If you only have fiat money (e.g. Dollars, Pounds, Euros), then you need to use an exchange service such as one of the following:
chooseExchanger: Many currency exchange services can be found on www.bestchange.ru or www.xchange.is
moreInformation: More information about working with exchangers
workOfTheExchangers: Overall, the work of the exchangers is identical. www.xchange.is.
chooseMethod: You may also consider using www.xchange.is Choose the most convenient method of replenishment in the first list, in the second drop-down list - ETH. Fill in all the required fields, enter the address of your ETH Ethereum Wallet, starting with 0x .., then click the "Start Exchange" button. Follow further instructions and wait for the transfer of ETH to your wallet.
